about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Kakashi Hatake (Double Sharingan), you will acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 2 Ninjutsu
- Kamui Lightning Blade (Ranged Type)
- Kamui Bond (Ranged Type)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Kamui Shuriken (Ranged Type)

• 2 Costumes
- Kakashi Outfit (Sixth Hokage Ver.): Top and Bottom, for male/female avatars
- Kakashi Outfit (Next Gen Ver.): Top and Bottom, for male/female avatars

• 1 Avatar Part
- Hair (Kakashi Hatake Sixth Hokage), for male/female avatars

• Additional Content
- Lobby Action: Make-out Lit.
- Honorary Title: Former Team 7 Leader

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: A special training pack for your avatar! Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Kakashi Hatake (Double Sharingan)!

English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
